4305650.name: Crosstown
4305650.description:
A throwback to 8-bit action computer games, Crosstown puts you in the toga of a nameless, memory-less humanoid, handed a gun by the sinister PIGGY and tasked with collecting qreds in an ever-changing maze full of monsters, bullets, upgrades, and explosions!

Up to four players can cooperate or compete to tackle 40 different levels and an endless mode!

Over a dozen different monsters lurk in the mazes, each with their own personalities; some of them hunt you, some of them hunt each other, some of them change the maze, and some of them seek out those elusive qreds!

An indie darling on the Xbox 360 in 2009, now available on Steam!
4305650.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
